hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) took a shoulder (of goat's meat) and after wiping his hand with a cloth on which he was sitting, he got up and prayed

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي تَرْكِ الْوُضُوءِ مِمَّا مَسَّتِ النَّارُ
chapter.eng-name: Not Performing Wudu' FRom [Food Which Had Been Cooked] Over Fire
